name: Space Fleet
description:
Play a lonely pilot in the empty space. Fight against multiple aliens and add friends to your fleet. Together with your friends destroy the alien boss and take revenge.

Controls

Move with WASD

Shoot with SPACE

Credits

Created by Zian Wermelinger, Michael Schertenleib, Tim Frey

You can find the source code here:

https://github.com/timmmmmb/Brackeys-Game-Jam-2021.1
